name: Without You
description:
Verse 1
This is unexplainable, Your the biggest secret, Jesus,
I just wish the whole world could see it,
I wished they would open up the bible, read it and believed it,
and prayed to receive the holy spirit,
and get Devine guidance from a source of a power that's bigger than goliath,
It's larger than science,
I tried to keep it in, but now I can't hide it,
This power inside, One day you might find it,
To climb new heights instead of downward spirals,
Grow to spread the message, Make it go viral,
See, I used to be lost in the world like waldo,
But the red on the pages made me start a new cycle,
He switched my life up and turned a villain to a hero,
I grew a pair of wings, Now I can fly like an eagle,
Born to be a witness, Born to tell the people,
You gotta help me Jesus, I'm so lost without you,
Chorus
I'm so lost without you, I'm so lost without you,
Please tell me, Please tell me,
Verse 2
Tell me all your secrets,
I've been reading from your story and began to believe it,
I tried to run away, but I could never leave it,
I'd be lost without you in my life, you complete it,
and I'll never be ashamed to admit that you saved me,
Loyalty forever, even if they hate me,
I'll never be a Judas, I'll never join the dark side,
I only got one chance, I only got one life, To live, 
One journey, It's the tournament of kings to live for eternity,
and eternally speaking, I put my trust in Jesus,
He's the only King I believe in,
and No I ain't perfect, I got my own demons,
I don't have any friends because they change like the seasons,
I'm praying for this world, I pray for the people,
You gotta help us Jesus, we're so lost without you,
So lost without you, So lost without you
